page.title: 09A Typical Day
page.content: On {Saturday}I get up at 9.00 or 10.00 a.m.I put on my{baggy jeans (they have five pockets on them) and my{striped T-shirt.}Then I brush my hair,and have my breakfast which is {toast with bovril on top}.I ask my mum if I can have 30 pence to get my comic {"The Get Along Gang".}When I come back I play with my friend. I have my dinner at 12.30. I have some{chips, {sausage or bacon.}When it has settled I go out to play again. Most Saturdays I play{"Zombies and {Humans".}It's the same as "Hide and Seek". I go in at 5.oo p.m. and have some tea like{spaghetti on {toast.}I watch T.V.until I go out.I finally come in at 8,00.p.m.and watch T.V. until I go to bed at 9.00 p.m. My favourite programme is{"Hunter". Nicola Pearson.
